Parameters: View: The child view to which the anchor coordinates will apply.
float: The anchor coordinates for the provided child view, by default set to a pre-defined constant on the horizontal axis and half of the child height on the vertical axis (vertical center).
adjustAnchorOffsetXY(android.view.View,.Description: Override this method if you wish to adjust the anchor coordinates for each child view during a layout pass. In the override set the new desired anchor coordinates in the provided array. The coordinates should be provided in relation to the child view.

ClassDesc: An implementation of the @B_android#support#wear#widget#WearableLinearLayoutManager#LayoutCallback_E@ aligning the children of the associated @B_android#support#wear#widget#WearableRecyclerView_E@ along a pre-defined vertical curve.
